name: FormaFina
overview: FormaFina is a flash sales ecommerce site of home decor for Latin America. Our aim is to make quality home decor products and brands accesible to everyone. We partner with top brands and up-and-coming talented designers to present to our users a curated, inspirational selection at special prices. By cutting intermediaries, we offer discounts up to 70%.
